item.title: The Trinidad Carnival Power List: Ten Local Entrepreneurs Behind The Caribbean's Biggest Bacchanal
item.description:
The Trinidad Carnival Power List: Ten Local Entrepreneurs Behind The Caribbean's Biggest Bacchanal

VideoTrinidad Carnival is serious business. No, really. The star-studded annual bacchanal kicking off next week, attracting upwards of 40,000 revelers, including the likes of Jay-Z and Richard Branson, is an intricately staged set of sumptuous events beginning just after Christmas and lasting through the grand parade on Carnival Tuesday.

item.title: The Black Allure
item.description:
The Black Allure

Models : Ajak Deng, Arlenis Sosa Peña, Chanel Iman, Georgie Baddiel, Jourdan Dunn, Joan Smalls, Kinee Diouf, Lais Ribeiro, Melodie Monrose, Mia Aminata Niaria, Rose Cordero & Sessilee Lopez.

item.title: Costa Rica & Puerto Rico are happiest countries in Latin America, according to World Happiness report
item.description:
Costa Rica & Puerto Rico are happiest countries in Latin America, according to World Happiness report

Costa Rica (14) and Puerto Rico (15) are the happiest countries in Latin America according to the latest version of the World Happiness Report. Denmark was rated the world's most happiest country for the second year running. Switzerland, Iceland, Norway and Finland were also within the top five.

item.title: Esteban Cortázar Tackles Fashion's Timing Gap
item.description:
Esteban Cortázar Tackles Fashion's Timing Gap

PARIS, France - Esteban Cortázar was on the Eurostar to London when he heard Oscar-winning actress Cate Blanchett had chosen one of his designs to wear to the premiere of Carol at the London Film Festival in October.

item.title: Supreme x Barrington Levy x Jah Life Collab
item.description:
Supreme x Barrington Levy x Jah Life Collab

Supreme continues to drop goods from its SS16 season with new pieces done in collaboration with legendary reggae musician Barrington Levy and influential Brooklyn-based record label Jah Life. Providing more information around the project, Supreme related the following: "In 1979, upstart New York reggae producer and Jamaican transplant Hyman "Jah Life" Wright began a prolific partnership with another fledgling producer, Henry "Junjo" Lawes, in reggae's epicenter of Kingston, Jamaica.

item.title: Muhammad Ali — 25 of the best photographs of the legendary boxer
item.description:
Muhammad Ali — 25 of the best photographs of the legendary boxer

Our picture editor, Jonny Weeks, has selected his favourite photographs of Muhammad Ali from the archives. The selection includes pictures of some of Ali's most memorable fights as well as many distinctive portraits from his life outside the ring
